tool_description: Manages document versions, tracks changes, and maintains revision history for collaborative business document development.

action_type.description: Version action: create, update, compare, or rollback

version_notes.description: Notes about changes made in this version

error_messages: Invalid document ID: Provide a valid document identifier
Invalid action type: Use one of [create, update, compare, rollback]
Missing content for update: Provide current_content when action_type is update
Document not found: The specified document ID does not exist for comparison or rollback
usage: Provide document_id and action_type for version management. Include current_content and version_notes for updates, author_name for attribution tracking.

version_number.description: Current version number of the document

change_summary.description: Summary of changes made in this version

version_history.description: List of all previous versions with timestamps
